transArray.content: The location is good because it is close to Solana and Joyang Park, and for the price, it seems really good. The cost-effectiveness is truly excellent. However, the double bed is slightly smaller than the queen bed, so when a family of three with a child goes, it is very uncomfortable to sleep together because the bed is very small. That's a bit disappointing. Also, it is a bit disappointing that the soundproofing is not good. Other than those two problems, there is no fault.

Hello dear, thank you for your affirmation of our work. The hotel is disinfected every day, and every detail of my location has been wiped with alcohol, so you can feel at ease in the room. There is Beijing Chaoyang Railway Station 700 meters away from the hotel. , it is very convenient to travel and is also very close to Chaoyang Joy City. It is your best choice for travel. There is nothing you can’t think of and nothing you can’t find. We look forward to your next visit!
